ground_truth.thought: 探究共享经济在养老服务行业的潜力
ground_truth.name: ResearchSharedEconomyInAgingCare

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'ResearchSharedEconomyInAgingCare', 'description': '探究共享经济在养老服务行业的潜力', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'case_studies', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': '国内外先进共享养老服务模式案例数量'}, {'name': 'data_years', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': '收集主要共享养老服务机构入住老人数量数据的年份范围'}, {'name': 'policy_info', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': '了解民政部门对共享养老服务的优惠政策'}, {'name': 'demand_forecast', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': '获取未来五年共享养老服务的需求规模'}, {'name': 'facility_requirements', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': '开展共享养老服务的设施要求'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'case_study_details', 'description': '案例研究的详细信息'}, {'name': 'institutional_data', 'description': '机构入住数据'}, {'name': 'policy_benefits', 'description': '政策优惠详情'}, {'name': 'demand_projection', 'description': '需求规模预测'}, {'name': 'facility_standards', 'description': '设施标准'}]}]
我打算探究共享经济在养老服务行业的潜力。首先，获取8个国内外先进的共享养老服务模式案例。然后，收集2021-2023年主要共享养老服务机构的入住老人数量数据。接着，了解民政部门对共享养老服务的优惠政策。最后，通过养老服务数据获取未来五年共享养老服务的需求规模，并获取一些开展共享养老服务的设施要求。当前这一步的目标是什么?
探究共享经济在养老服务行业的潜力
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?

{'case_study_details': '8 case studies on advanced shared elderly care models from around the world.', 'institutional_data': 'Resident data from major shared elderly care institutions from 2021 to 2023.', 'policy_benefits': 'Policy benefits for shared elderly care services from municipal civil affairs departments.', 'demand_projection': 'Demand scale forecast for shared elderly care services over the next five years.', 'facility_standards': 'Facility standards for implementing shared elderly care services.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'case_study_details': '8 case studies on advanced shared elderly care models from around the world.', 'institutional_data': 'Resident data from major shared elderly care institutions from 2021 to 2023.', 'policy_benefits': 'Policy benefits for shared elderly care services from municipal civil affairs departments.', 'demand_projection': 'Demand scale forecast for shared elderly care services over the next five years.', 'facility_standards': 'Facility standards for implementing shared elderly care services.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是调用工具来获取共享经济在养老服务行业的潜力相关的详细信息，包括案例研究的详细信息、机构入住数据、政策优惠详情、需求规模预测和设施标准。
